name: Untitled Grid Puzzle
description:
Controls are WASD to move, Space to jump, E to interact and left-click and right-click to mark cells in puzzles.

Currently showing a demo build of my game concept based on some puzzle ideas I developed some time ago.

This is only showing a small set of basic mechanics, more content is in development.

You've completed the all of the main line of content once you see the word "WIN".
